item.title: My site is back
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: There were some problems with China Telecom in the past several days, I could not access my blog site for almost a week. However, there was no problem if I went through China Mobile or China Unicom. It seems China Telecom blocked access to several the GoDaddy DNS servers, I don’t know the exact reason [...]
item.content:encoded:
There were some problems with China Telecom in the past several days, I could not access my blog site for almost a week. However, there was no problem if I went through China Mobile or China Unicom.

It seems China Telecom blocked access to several the GoDaddy DNS servers, I don’t know the exact reason behind the scene, but obviously there were something …

Anyway, good to see my site’s back.
